name: solanum
description: Experimental Scada package that uses web standards to display data in the browser

scripts.high_latency_netw: sudo tc qdisc add dev lo root netem delay 50ms # add 50 ms latency to localhost (lo)
scripts.low_bandwidth_netw: sudo tc qdisc add dev lo root netem rate 300kbit # limil localhost speed to 300kbit
scripts.reset_netw: sudo tc qdisc del dev lo root netem # RESET localhost to full speed

author: Sander Deryckere
